suite.name: eBox Jabber tests
suite.desc: Contains a set of tests to check that the eBox jabber module works properly.

test.name: Enable modules
test.desc: Enable jabber, network, firewall and users modules.

test.name: AddUser
test.desc: Adds an user and enable jabber account.

test.name: AddUser2
test.desc: Adds other user and enable jabber account.

test.name: ConfigJabberNonSSL
test.desc: Set server hostname and config jabber in non-ssl mode.

test.name: TestJabberNoSSL
test.desc: Try to send and receive a message between the two users.

test.name: ConfigJabberSSLOptional
test.desc: Config jabber in ssl optional mode.

test.name: TestJabberSSLOptionalWithoutTLS
test.desc: Try to send and receive a message between the two users.

test.name: TestJabberSSLOptionalWithTLS
test.desc: Try to send and receive a message between the two users.

test.name: ConfigJabberSSLRequired
test.desc: Config jabber in ssl required mode.

test.name: TestJabberSSLRequiredWithoutTLS
test.desc: Try to send and receive a message between the two users.

test.name: TestJabberSSLRequiredWithTLS
test.desc: Try to send and receive a message between the two users.
